text: aur jin auraton ko talaaq dee gayee hai vah apane aapako talaaq ke baad teen haiz ke khatm ho jaane tak nikaah saanee se roke aur agar vah auraten khuda aur roje aakhirat par eemaan laayeen hain to unake lie jaez nahin hai ki jo kuchh bhee khuda ne unake raham (pet) mein paida kiya hai usako chhipaen aur agar un ke shauhar mel jol karana chaahen to vah (muddat mazakoora) mein un ke vaapas bula lene ke jyaada haqadaar hain aur shareeyat muvaaphiq auraton ka (mardon par) vahee sab kuchh haq hai jo mardon ka auraton par hai haan alabatta mardon ko (fajeelat mein) auraton par phauqiyat zarur hai aur khuda zabaradast hiqamat vaala hai
